text:
As of 2024-12-31, BNP reported:
- Total assets: 2.70 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 308.05 billion USD
- Total debt: 379.89 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 128.14 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 118.19 billion USD
- Net debt: 69.00 billion USD

As of 2023-12-31, BNP reported:
- Total assets: 2.59 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 408.22 billion USD
- Total debt: 346.85 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 123.74 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 114.05 billion USD
- Net debt: not available

As of 2022-12-31, BNP reported:
- Total assets: 2.66 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 474.92 billion USD
- Total debt: 293.98 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 121.24 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 112.15 billion USD
- Net debt: not available

As of 2021-12-31, BNP reported:
- Total assets: 2.63 trillion USD
- Cash and cash equivalents: 484.27 billion USD
- Total debt: 279.25 billion USD
- Common stock equity: 117.89 billion USD
- Tangible book value: 109.11 billion USD
- Net debt: not available

As of 2020-12-31, BNP reported:
- Total assets: not available
- Cash and cash equivalents: not available
- Total debt: not available
- Common stock equity: not available
